changes.desc: List of changes to apply on the specified canvas.

errors.canvas_not_found: The canvas you wish to apply changes to is not available.
errors.canvas_disabled_user_team: Canvas is disabled on user's team
errors.free_teams_cannot_edit_standalone_canvas: Free teams cannot edit standalone canvases
errors.restricted_action: User does not have permission to perform this action.
errors.canvas_editing_failed: The changes to the canvas failed to be applied.
